post.summary: Compensation for transaction rollback
This is the UE api for ExtOrderProcessCmd task command.
post.description: ExtOrderProcessCmd is a task command which is used to perform custom processing just prior to the completion of the OrderProcessCmd controller command.

post.summary: This is the postUE api for OrderCalculateCmd controller command.
post.description:
OrderCalculateCmd is a controller command which is used to re-calculate specified calculation usages.
This command is called by OrderItemBaseCmdImpl and OrderItemDeleteCmdImpl to refresh the order price, charges and freebie items after Add, Update and Delete order item.

post.summary: This is the preUE api for OrderCalculateCmd controller command.
post.description:
OrderCalculateCmd is a controller command which is used to re-calculate specified calculation usages.
This command is called by OrderItemBaseCmdImpl and OrderItemDeleteCmdImpl to refresh the order price, charges and freebie items after Add, Update and Delete order item.

This command is called by OrderItemBaseCmdImpl and OrderItemDeleteCmdImpl to refresh the order price, charges and freebie items after Add, Update and Delete order item.

post.summary: This is the UE api for OrderMessagingCmd task command.
post.description: OrderMessagingCmd is a task command that generates the outbound Order Create Message "Report_NC_PurchaseOrder".

post.summary: This is the UE api for OrderNotifyCmd task command.
post.description: OrderNotifyCmd is task command is used to Sends order notification message.

post.summary: This is the postUE api for OrderPrepareCmd controller command.
post.description: OrderPrepareCmd is a controller command which is used to prepare an order by determining prices, discounts, shipping charges, shipping adjustment,and taxes for an order. If an order reference number is not specified,all current pending orders will be prepared for the current customer at the given store.

post.summary: This is the preUE api for OrderPrepareCmd controller command.
post.description: OrderPrepareCmd is a controller command which is used to prepare an order by determining prices, discounts, shipping charges, shipping adjustment,and taxes for an order. If an order reference number is not specified,all current pending orders will be prepared for the current customer at the given store.

post.summary: This is the replaceUE api for OrderPrepareCmd controller command.
post.description: OrderPrepareCmd is a controller command which is used to prepare an order by determining prices, discounts, shipping charges, shipping adjustment,and taxes for an order. If an order reference number is not specified,all current pending orders will be prepared for the current customer at the given store.

post.summary: This is the postUE api for OrderProcessCmd controller command.
post.description: OrderProcessCmd is a controller command which is used to submit an order. The order must have been locked by OrderPrepare. Once the  OrderProcess command begins running, the order cannot be cancelled with OrderCancel.

post.summary: This is the preUE api for OrderProcessCmd controller command.
post.description: OrderProcessCmd is a controller command which is used to submit an order. The order must have been locked by OrderPrepare. Once the  OrderProcess command begins running, the order cannot be cancelled with OrderCancel.

post.summary: This is the replaceUE api for OrderProcessCmd controller command.
post.description: OrderProcessCmd is a controller command which is used to submit an order. The order must have been locked by OrderPrepare. Once the  OrderProcess command begins running, the order cannot be cancelled with OrderCancel.

post.summary: This is the UE api for PreProcessOrder task command.
post.description: PreProcessOrderCmd is a task command which is used to pre process the order, it's called before the calling of ProcessOrderCmd.

post.summary: This is the UE api for ProcessOrderCmd task command.
post.description: ProcessOrderCmd is a task command which is used to submit an order.

post.summary: This is the UE api for ProcessOrderSubmitEventCmd task command.
post.description: ProcessOrderSubmitEventCmd is a task command which is used to process the event captured by the listener when the event name is order submit.

post.summary: Synchronizes the gift wrap with the order item it belongs to - makes or breaks the association, or updates the gift wrap quantity.

order.description: The order pojo object containing order items whose shipping addresses will be updated

addressIds.description: AddressIds which is used to update shipping addresses of order items

validateRequired.description: Whether shipping address validation is required. The default value is false

defaultAddressUsed.description: Whether the shipping addresses use the default shipping addresses for registered user. If no other appropriate addresses are found, the default value is true.

shippingAddresses.description: The pojo array converted from ShippingAddressAccessBeans

UpdateShippingAddressCmdUEOutput.description: This is the UpdateShippingAddressCmd UE output pojo

billToRn.description: The reference number of the address to bill

notifyMerchant.description: Whether to notify the merchant when the order has been processed

notifyShopper.description: Whether to notify the shopper when the order has been processed

quoteExpiredURL.description: The URL to redirect to if the order total expired in agreement with the expiry policy set by the setQuoteExpiryPolicy method

quoteExpiryPolicy.description: The behavior of the command if the order total expires or an order item's fulfillment center changes during inventory allocation

maxAvailabilityChange.description: The time interval, in seconds, used with the url set by the setAvailabilityChangeURL method

noInventoryURL.description: The URL to redirect to if any of the order items in the order cannot be allocated or backordered

notifyOrderSubmitted.description: Whether the customer should be notified when the order is successfully submitted

transferMode.description: The transferMode property of the command

PreProcessOrderCmdUEOutput.description: This is the PreProcessOrderCmd UE output pojo

order.description: The order pojo object containing order items whose shipping addresses will be updated

addressIds.description: AddressIds which is used to update shipping addresses of order items

validateRequired.description: Whether shipping address validation is required. The default value is false

defaultAddressUsed.description: Whether the shipping addresses use the default shipping addresses for registered user. If no other appropriate addresses are found, the default value is true.

shippingAddresses.description: The pojo array converted from ShippingAddressAccessBeans

UpdateShippingAddressCmdUEInput.description: This is the UpdateShippingAddressCmd UE input pojo

OrderNotifyCmdUEOutput.description: This is the OrderNotifyCmd UE output pojo

totalTax.description: The total tax of the order

totalRecyclingFee.description: The total recycling fee of the order

TaxIntegrationCustomCmdUEInput.description: This is the TaxIntegrationCustomCmd UE input pojo

cost.description: The total cost for this order item.If the order item is for 4 units at $10 each, then the total cost would be $40.

discount.description: The total value of all non-tax-exempt discounts for this line item.

jurisdictionCodes.description: Obtains all the jurisdiction levels (codes) where the taxes are being calculated.Accepted types can be 'COUNTRY', 'TERRITORY', 'STATE', 'COUNTY', 'CITY' and 'DISTRICT'and the paramter should be set as this sequence:[COUNTRY,TERRITORY,STATE,COUNTY,CITY,DISTRICT] in array

secondaryJurisdictionCodes.description: Obtains all the secondary jurisdiction levels (secondary codes) where the taxes are being calculated.Accepted types can be 'SECONDARYSTATE', 'SECONARYCOUNTY', 'SECONDARYCITY' and the paramter should be set as this sequence:[SECSTATE,SECCOUNTY,SECCITY] in array

secondaryTaxAmounts.description: Obtains the tax amounts calculated for each of the given secondary jurisdiction levels returned from the tax calculation modules.Accepted types can be 'SECONDARYSTATE', 'SECONARYCOUNTY', 'SECONDARYCITY' and the paramter should be set as this sequence:[SECONDARYSTATE, SECONARYCOUNTY, SECONDARYCITY] in array

taxAmounts.description: Obtains the tax amounts calculated for each of the given jurisdiction levels returned from the tax calculation modules.Accepted types can be 'COUNTRY', 'TERRITORY', 'STATE', 'COUNTY', 'CITY' and 'DISTRICT'and the paramter should be set as this sequence:[COUNTRY,TERRITORY,STATE,COUNTY,CITY,DISTRICT] in array

taxTypes.description: Obtains all the taxing authority or jurisdiction levels where the taxes calculated.

totalTax.description: Obtains the total tax calculated for this order item for all relevant taxing authorities.

auditFlag.description: Turns on or off the audit (logging) of tax calculations for this order item.This is usually turned on only for the actual purchase and left off for all other calculations. It is false by default.

businessName.description: The name of the particular business location whichsells the order item.  In WCS we set this to the same value as the sellerId

buyerName.description: The name of the purchaser for this item.This field is typically used to determine if the purchaser has a tax exempt status or any other pertanent information.

currencyCode.description: This 3-character ISO currency code identifies the currency in which the transaction is being made.

freight.description: The total sbipping charge for this order item.

invoiceNumber.description: A unique string representing the Sales invoice.This method provides the ability to attach an identifier to the order itemIt is not used in the actual tax calculation.  It is typically used to track orders between systems.

itemCnt.description: The number of units of this order item being purchased.

sellerID.description: This method is used to set the seller identification.For WCS this is the Store Identifier.This is assigned when the store is initially created and cannot be changed.

sellerRegistrationId.description: This is A seller registration identifier.This value is needed for international taxation.

shipFromAddress.description: The street address from which the order item will be shipped.This is either the address of the store or the fulfillment center address.

shipFromCity.description: The city portion of the address from which the order item will be shipped.This is either the address of the store or the fulfillment center address.

shipFromCountry.description: The country from which the order item will be shipped.This is from either the address of the store or the fulfillment center address.

shipFromState.description: The state portion of the address from which the order item will be shipped.This is either the address of the store or the fulfillment center address.

shipFromTaxGeoCode.description: The tax jurisdiction code (geoCode) from which the order item will be shipped.This is either the address of the store or the fulfillment center address.

shipFromZip.description: The zip code or postal code of the address from which the order item will be shipped.This is either theaddress of the store or the fulfillment center address.

shipToAddress.description: The street address to which the order item will be shipped.

shipToCity.description: The city portion of the address to which the order item will be shipped.

shipToCountry.description: The country to which the order item will be shipped.

shipToState.description: The state portion of the address to which the order item will be shipped.

shipToTaxGeoCode.description: The tax jurisdiction code (geoCode) to which the order item will be shipped.

shipToZip.description: The zip code or postal code of the address to which the order item will be shipped.

storeId.description: The id of the input store to be used for determining the tax types.

taxCode.description: the tax treatment code for this order item.In WebSphere Commerce Suite this maps to the tax calculation code.This is usually associated with a group of products that are taxed the same. i.e. groceries, clothing, automobiles, etc.

transactionType.description: The type of transaction.The default type is a Sale.valid values are 'B' - Backout a previous sale,'C' - Credit,'P' - Purchase,'R' - Return,'S' - Sale

timeShipped.description: The time and date the order item shipped.

taxRate.description: Obtains the tax rate for a given type of jurisdiction level.Accepted types can be 'COUNTRY', 'TERRITORY', 'STATE', 'COUNTY', 'CITY' and 'DISTRICT'and the paramter should be set as this sequence:[COUNTRY,TERRITORY,STATE,COUNTY,CITY,DISTRICT] in array

totalTaxRate.description: Obtains the total tax rate for this order item for all relevant taxing authorities.

secondaryTaxRate.description: Obtains the tax rate for a given type of secondary jurisdiction level.Accepted types can be 'SECONDARYSTATE', 'SECONARYCOUNTY', 'SECONDARYCITY' and the paramter should be set as this sequence:[SECSTATE,SECCOUNTY,SECCITY] in array

recyclingFee.description: Obtains the recycling fee for this order item.

TaxIntegrationCustomOrderItem.description: This is the TaxIntegrationCustomOrderItem pojo which is part of TaxIntegrationCustomCmd UE input/ouput.
